content: new world of color opened for her as well where once she would have scoxed at an earth tone or a deep red my favorite color one day she announced i like all of the colors now and so rosalie s daughter was born a tribute to the mother whose talents i couldn t begin to match and a way for her to still experience the creative process she always enjoyed so much it s also a daily remembrance of our shared love of all things related to yarn because as much as we all hate to admit it when we re young i am proud today to say that i am very much my mother s daughter with a focus on interesting textures and embracing all the colors i hope the pieces i design bring as much joy to you as they did to rosalie and me during their creation contact the designer becca goldthwaite carlson email rosaliesdaughter artisanshop@gmail com website www rosaliesdaughter com fb @rosaliesdaughter shop insta @rosaliesdaughter artisanshop etsy rosaliesdaughter etsy com ravelry www ravelry com/designers/becca-carlson © 2025 rebecca carlson | rosalie s daughter 3
